document.full_text: japanese cabinet ministers on tuesday moved to shore up confidence in u.s. debt after standard & poor's threatened to lower its credit rating on the world's largest economy due to a bulging budget deficit, touching a nerve with one of the largest holders of treasuries.
document.title: japan ministers confident in treasuries after s&p move
lines_and_colors: japanese cabinet ministers on tuesday moved to shore up confidence in u.s. debt after standard & poor's threatened to lower its credit rating on the world's largest economy due to a bulging budget deficit, touching a nerve with one of the largest holders of treasuries.
